description: Number of symmetric Latin squares of order 2n with constant diagonal.
references: N. T. Gridgeman, Latin squares under restriction and a jumboization, J. Rec. Math., 5 (No. 3, 1972), 198-202.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Latin squares and rectangles
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Daniele Degiorgi (degiorgi(AT)inf.ethz.ch) suggests that this is an erroneous version of A000438.
